data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick Roma.
In the minute 2, Parma Calcio's Gervinho is whistled for offside at Stadio Olimpico.
Roma push forward at Stadio Olimpico and Bryan Cristante gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Parma Calcio defence.
In Rome Roma drive forward through Jordan Veretout. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 5, Roma have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
In Rome, Pedro of Roma is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Roma's Jordan Veretout gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Roma to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
In the minute 11, Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan breaks free at Stadio Olimpico. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
In the minute 16, Gianluca Manganiello awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 19, Parma Calcio drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 22, Pedro of Roma gets in a strike, but is off target.
Gianluca Manganiello awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Gianluca Manganiello signals a Roma throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Goal! Borja Mayoral gives Roma a 1-0 lead in Rome.
In the minute 28, Leonardo Spinazzola with an assist there.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Roma.
In the minute 32, Goal! Henrikh Mkhitaryan extends Roma's lead to 2-0.
Borja Mayoral instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Stadio Olimpico.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Gianluca Manganiello awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 40, Great finish from Henrikh Mkhitaryan to give Roma a 3-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Rick Karsdorp.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Roma.
Roma have a dangerous throw-in.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Rome.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 48, Parma Calcio are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Roma's Pedro gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Parma Calcio defender.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 53, Attention is being given to Romaâ€™s Roger Ibanez and play has been suspended briefly.
Paulo Fonseca (Roma) is making a first substitution, with Juan Jesus replacing Roger Ibanez.
Roma push upfield but Gianluca Manganiello quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 57, Important block from the Parma Calcio defence as Rick Karsdorp fires in a strike for Roma.
Important block from the Parma Calcio defence as Gonzalo Villar fires in a strike for Roma.
Roma are coming forward and Jordan Veretout gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rome.
Roma have a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Juraj Kucka with Jasmin Kurtic. This is the first substitution made today by Fabio Liverani.
In the minute 62, Yann Karamoh is replacing Gervinho for Parma Calcio at Stadio Olimpico.
Fabio Liverani is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Juan Brunetta replacing Yordan Osorio.
Pedro for Roma gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 65, Gianluca Manganiello awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Roma make their second substitution with Carles Perez replacing Borja Mayoral.
Yann Karamoh gets his shot on target but fails to score for Parma Calcio.
In the minute 68, Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan is on target but unsuccessful.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Roma in their own half.
In Rome, Carles Perez of Roma is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Roma pushes forward through Leonardo Spinazzola, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 79, Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bruno Peres is replacing Leonardo Spinazzola for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
In Rome, Parma Calcio push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The home team have replaced Gonzalo Villar with Amadou Diawara. This is the fourth substitution made today by Paulo Fonseca.
In the minute 80, Paulo Fonseca is making the team's fifth substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Lorenzo Pellegrini replacing Pedro.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Gianluca Manganiello.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Roma close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fabio Liverani (Parma Calcio) is making a fourth substitution, with Maxime Busi replacing Alberto Grassi.
In the minute 84, Giuseppe Pezzella is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
The away team replace Giuseppe Pezzella with Simone Iacoponi.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Roma.
Carles Perez (Roma) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Roma are pushing forward but Lorenzo Pellegrini's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rome.
Gianluca Manganiello signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Gianluca Manganiello blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
